problem_statement:
Are there some differences between 'Response time' and 'Latency' in the report?
![report](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/25378640/190362929-8337e83b-4cca-44c8-a419-1f474ef37d1d.png)
pull_message:
Update printer
Resolve #189 #228 

Since we have JSON output, we assume users don't parse from the summary output and we don't aim for a 100% compatible summary of `hey`.
setup_command:
#!/usr/bin/env bash
set -euo pipefail

# Install tools required to run tests and produce JUnit XML reports.
# Do not use sudo. We assume rust and cargo are already installed in the environment.
# Ensure ~/.cargo/bin is on PATH
export PATH="$HOME/.cargo/bin:$PATH"

# Install cargo2junit for converting cargo test JSON output into JUnit XML.
# If it's already installed, cargo will skip rebuilding it.
if ! command -v cargo2junit >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo "Installing cargo2junit..."
    cargo install cargo2junit
else
    echo "cargo2junit already installed"
fi

# Print versions for debugging
rustc --version || true
cargo --version || true
if command -v cargo2junit >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo "cargo2junit is installed"
else
    echo "cargo2junit is not installed"
fi

echo "Setup complete."
cargo fetch --locked
